attributes.action: prevent NHS trusts using their resources on non health related  activities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The proposal by a NHS trust in Kingston upon Hill to spend half a million pounds on a sailing boat for use by young people is indefensible. Scarce NHS resources must be directed at providing the essential equipment and services for those who are sick and disabled. We cannot afford to waste scarce resources on frivolous ideas. Managers, who propose such expenditure, should be examined to see whether they are the appropriate people to hold such positions.
